title: Cows Can't Blow Bubbles
description: Cows Can't Blow Bubbles (featuring shapes animals make) is part of the Cows Can't Series, which also includes Cows Can't Jump (animal actions), Cows Can't Quack (animal sounds), Cows Can't Spin Silk (animal creations) and Las vacas no pueden saltar (bilingual Spanish/English edition of Cows Can't Jump). By listening to and reading aloud these fun, educational and engaging picture books, young children will learn the names of dozens of animals — and their actions, sounds, creations and shape-making skills — reinforcing early reading skills and a love of books! The Cows Can't Series is perfect for young listeners and beginning readers ages newborn to six years old. Cows Can't Blow Bubbles is available in chunky-style Stubby & Stout™ Board-book format (ideal for small hands) and Glossy Paperback format (for older children).Titles in the Series have received high praise including "Will fast become your child's favorite bedtime story", "A new staple in our daily reading", "Perfect for my early reader", "Every home with small children needs a copy” and “Just as adorable and fun as ‘Cows Can’t Jump’”. and "On my list of all-time favorite picture books". All titles are available in Stubby & Stout™ board-book format (ideal for little ones) and paperback formats (for older children).The Series is published by Jumping Cow Press, which actively supports early literacy programs and partners with a direct-impact foundation to provide tens of thousands of copies of the Series at no cost to Reach Out and Read, Parent-Child Home+, Pajama Program, Read to Grow, Raising a Reader, Kids Need to Read, Get Georgia Reading, Literacy, Inc. (LINC) and Read by 4th, all of which integrate the Cows Can't Series into their early childhood literacy programs.From the Back Cover of Cows Can't Blow Bubbles: Turn the page and take a ride, as fireflies flash dots, peacocks flare fans and jackfish spawn tornadoes. From crescents to stars, mounds to clouds and bubbles to puddles, a bounty of fun and learning awaits as creatures large and small display their shape-making skills. For more read-aloud amusement, check out the companion titles Cows Can’t Jump (featuring about animal actions), Cows Can't Quack (sounds) and Cows Can't Spin Silk (creations). Learn more about the Series, and download free printable activity sheets and learning guides, at JumpingCowPress.com. Follow Jumping Cow Press on Twitter (@cowscantjump) and Facebook (/jumpingcowpress).
author: Dave Reisman
